title: 1n4ho12
author: 1n4ho12
content: Hello,Are there any getwork bitcoin pools?

comments.author: NotFuzzyWarm
comments.body: Quote from: 1n4ho12 on September 02, 2022, 08:16:15 AMHello,Are there any getwork bitcoin pools?No. That is a very old protocol that has been replaced by the far more bandwidth efficient stratum.

comments.author: ABCbits
comments.body: Quote from: gunhell16 on January 24, 2023, 04:48:51 AMAnd several mining pools support Getwork protocol such as Slushpool, Btc guild, EclipseMc, and others.FYI Slush Pool was renamed into Braiins Pool[1] while both EMC (EclipseMc) and BTC Guild are dead[2-3]. And obviously Braiins Pool no longer support getwork.Quote from: NotFuzzyWarm on January 24, 2023, 12:35:00 PMQuote from: 1n4ho12 on September 02, 2022, 08:16:15 AMHello,Are there any getwork bitcoin pools?No. That is a very old protocol that has been replaced by the far more bandwidth efficient stratum.And on few full node software, getwork has been replaced with getblocktemplate[4]. Usually for solo mining purpose.[1] https://braiins.com/pool[2] https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=16385.msg14340574#msg14340574[3] https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=49417.msg13191999#msg13191999[4] https://developer.bitcoin.org/reference/rpc/getblocktemplate.html
